lead_paragraph: Kasey Kahne picked up Budweiser as the primary sponsor for his No. 9 Dodge. Budweiser became the most valuable sponsorship in Nascar when it teamed with Dale Earnhardt Jr. in 2000. But Earnhardt is leaving Dale Earnhardt Inc. for Hendrick Motorsports at the end of this season, and he will announce a new sponsor today.
